data.name: Sea of Leaves
data.detailed_description:
A young girl disappears from her hometown.
What was behind her vanishing?

Sea of Leaves is a contemplative game set in Puglia, in southern Italy.

In Sea of Leaves you will explore the mystery through the stream of consciousness, which will reveal thoughts, memories, feelings and sensation.
Sea of Leaves is a contemplative experience that deals with complex themes mixed with traditional apulian elements.

Sea of Leaves is developed by The Sea and The Forest.

Join our Discord server http://discord.gg/s6j4cDM

data.short_description: A young girl disappears from her hometown What was behind her vanishing? Sea of Leaves is a contemplative, half-drama, half-mystery game, set in southern Italy.
data.reviews:
“Leaves does an excellent job by telling a complex background story with the help of the world”
Game Curator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce MX130 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or Ubuntu 16.04 or 17.04
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce MX130 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
